|exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 10 |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 03/2005 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-00000382-010" and "Rev.A" is silkscreened on the board of the unit shown below. :A date code of '''0512''' (March 2005) is etched onto the bottom of the board.. and is the basis for the release estimate in this entry. :Caps on this board are '''S.Y.''' branded. Info derived from the serial dumps below would seem to indicate the stock firmware is using the '''Nucleus RTOS'''. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
JP1
[3.3]
[RxD]
[GND
[TxD]
===Info derived from=== {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Belkin F5D5231-4 v3 board top.jpg|board top File:Belkin F5D5231-4 v3 board bot.jpg|board bottom
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ===Included PSU(s)=== The power adapter included with the device is a '''DVE''' DVR-1250-B11. ID/OD/Len measurements used in the main infobox are approximate. {{hasPowerSupply |brand = DVE |model = DVR-1250-B11 |input_v=120 |input_c=AC |input_hz=60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=0.5 |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=3 |countrymanuf = China }} [[Category:English Documentation]]
